text: Lorenzetti is an Italian surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Ambrogio Lorenzetti, Sienese painter *Enrico Lorenzetti, Italian moto GP racer of the 1940s and 1950s *Gustavo Lorenzetti, Argentine footballer *Pietro Lorenzetti, Sienese painter, brother of Ambrogio Lorenzetti *Ricardo Lorenzetti, current president elect of the Argentine Supreme Court of Justice Category:Italian-language surnames
title: Lorenzetti
